price: 12. Dis à ceux qui ont mécru : « Vous serez vaincus et rassemblés en foule dans la Géhenne ; et alors là, quelle horrible couche ! »
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu
